snippet.title: Scriptum - Escape Room based on Augmented Reality
snippet.description:
Sharpen your senses to be able to escape from the Scriptum room. You must look for all the necessary clues to find the way out. Remember that you only have 15 minutes.

Scriptum is developed in Augmented Reality, detects the floor thanks to the properties of Google ARCore / ARKit and the camera of your smartphone.
